text: James Allen's Girls' School, (JAGS), is an independent day school in Dulwich, South London. It is the oldest girls’ independent school in Greater London.JAGS website, History of School : "JAGS is the oldest girls’ independent school in Greater London" The school is a registered charity. It was originally part of Edward Alleyn's College of God's Gift charitable foundation. This also included Alleyn's School and Dulwich College. It has a senior school for 11 to 18-year-old girls, a prep school for 7 to 11-year-old girls (James Allen's Preparatory School), and a pre-preparatory school for 4- to 7-year-old girls. It is the sister school of Dulwich College and Alleyn's. == References == Category:18th-century establishments in England Category:1740s establishments in Europe Category:1741 establishments Category:Schools in London Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Southwark Category:British public schools
title: James Allen's Girls' School
